resources.string: Failed to call server (%1$s), please try again later
Your device is scanning other devices around you
Scanning cannot be started, click here to resolve
Do you need to remain in a quarantine?
My unique identifier for the medical personnel:
Application may have an issue. Please check your phone settings and make sure that:
Application has permission for current location â€“ necessary for bluetooth to work
You have access to internet either WiFi or mobile data
Reduce your risk of coronavirus infection
Regularly and thoroughly clean your hands with an alcohol-based hand rub or wash them with soap and water.
Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Then dispose of the used tissue immediately.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth
Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.
Clean or disinfect the surfaces you\'re frequently in contact with.
Stay at home if you begin to feel unwell, even with mild symptoms such as headache and slight runny nose, until you recover.

Watch for symptoms

Patients with COVID-19 have experienced mild to severe respiratory illness. Most common symptoms are:

Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath

Persistent pain or pressure in the chest

New confusion or inability to arouse

Bluish lips or face
Please check your country code and enter your phone number
Please enter your phone number that the medical personnel can contact you at in case you were exposed to an infected person.
I agree with processing of my potentially health-related data
Phone number is invalid, please check and correct
You have to agree with data processing
We\'ve sent a confirmation code to you phone.\n\nTo complete the verification process please enter the 6-digit number below.
Invalid verification code, please try again.
Are you sure you want to leave without completing the verification process? You will need to go through the process again later.
Please select the place you\'ll be spending the quarantine in. You won\'t be able to change this place later so make sure it\'s correct.

You've selected this address:
%1$s

This address will be your quarantine, you can't change this address later.
Please enter the date when you were supposed to enter the quarantine.
Please scan your face for future verification of your quarantine.
Collected data is stored solely on this device.
By remaining in quarantine you help prevent the spread of COVID-19 disease.
Invalid software license for face recognition, please contact the application publisher.
Failed to initialize the camera, please try again.
Application failed to get access to camera, please try again.
Application hasn\'t got permission to access camera, please confirm this permission.
Failed to recognize your face, please try again.
Failed to verify your face, please try again.
